1492560.name: Paradise Killer: Art of Paradise
1492560.description:
A dreadful tome of visions of Paradise. Portraits of killers, sycophants, criminals and demons. Postcards from an island of mutable truths, bizarre facts and a scorching sun. Memories of the earliest days of Island Sequence 24. Glimpses into lost realities. Words from dreadful cosmic artists. Please enjoy.

Paradise Killer Art Works collects the beautiful character art, and sun drenched environments from Paradise Killer. It also includes early development images and commentary from the developers.

To access this digital art book:

  • Right click Paradise Killer in your Steam Library
  • Select Manage
  • Select Browse Local Files
  • Open Paradise Killer Art Works.zip
If automatic updates are turned off, please update the Paradise Killer base game first on Steam.

Enjoy this and other fruits of Paradise in the Paradise 25 edition bundle.
